events.description: Tim Anderson grounds out, second baseman Andres Gimenez to first baseman David Fry. 1 out
Andrew Benintendi lines out to center fielder Myles Straw. 2 outs
Luis Robert Jr. lines out to left fielder Steven Kwan. 3 outs
Steven Kwan flies out to center fielder Luis Robert Jr. 1 out
Andres Gimenez doubles (17) on a sharp line drive to right fielder Trayce Thompson.
Jose Ramirez singles on a ground ball to center fielder Luis Robert Jr. Andres Gimenez scores.
Oscar Gonzalez singles on a ground ball to left fielder Andrew Benintendi. Jose Ramirez to 2nd.
Will Brennan pops out to second baseman Elvis Andrus on the infield fly rule. 2 outs
David Fry flies out to second baseman Elvis Andrus in foul territory. 3 outs
Andrew Vaughn singles on a ground ball to third baseman Jose Ramirez, deflected by pitcher Logan Allen.
Injury Delay.
Yoan Moncada strikes out swinging. 1 out
Yasmani Grandal grounds into a double play, third baseman Jose Ramirez to second baseman Andres Gimenez to first baseman David Fry. Andrew Vaughn out at 2nd. Yasmani Grandal out at 1st. 3 outs
Brayan Rocchio flies out to left fielder Andrew Benintendi. 1 out
Bo Naylor grounds out, second baseman Elvis Andrus to first baseman Andrew Vaughn. 2 outs
Myles Straw singles on a line drive to second baseman Elvis Andrus, deflected by pitcher Mike Clevinger.
Myles Straw steals (13) 2nd base. Myles Straw to 3rd. Myles Straw advances to 3rd, on a throwing error by catcher Yasmani Grandal.
Steven Kwan walks.
Steven Kwan steals (16) 2nd base.
Wild pitch by pitcher Mike Clevinger. Myles Straw scores. Steven Kwan to 3rd.
